Russia says Ukraine attacked Crimea with 38 dronesRussian air defence systems destroyed all 38 drones that Ukraine launched at the Crimean Peninsula early on Sunday, Russia's defence ministry said, after reports on Ukrainian and Russian social media of powerful explosions in the port of Feodosia. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 03:38:46 GMT ZODQUMSRFFLFFLYJXYYDTURTEU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-ukraine-attacked-crimea-with-38-drones-2024-03-03/Reuters世界欧洲
Haitian police unions plead for help after attack on main prisonArmed groups were closing in on Haiti's largest prison on Saturday night, defying police forces who called for help after days of gunfire in parts of the capital as a major gang leader seeks to topple Prime Minister Ariel Henry. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 02:53:39 GMT BH35BNB2RJL25E5I5MTJ267HDY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/haitian-police-unions-plead-help-after-attack-main-prison-2024-03-03/Reuters世界美洲
Canada, Italy leaders cancel Toronto event for security reasonsCanadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni on Saturday canceled a joint visit to the Art Gallery of Ontario in Toronto for security reasons, according to a Canadian spokesperson. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 01:59:01 GMT HUR65CZUGFM6BJK6CXZWPJ57N4 https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-italy-leaders-cancel-toronto-event-security-reasons-2024-03-03/Carlos Osorio世界
Gaza truce talks expected as offensive and aid crisis rage onIsraeli and Hamas delegations were expected to arrive in Cairo on Sunday, though a source briefed on the talks said Israel would not send a delegation until it got a full list of hostages who are still alive. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 01:13:59 GMT NPZFSNEETZPEFHJ3LTL3SMZPXU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/talks-gaza-truce-expected-offective-aid-crisis-rage-2024-03-03/Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
Government candidate wins Australia by-election amid cost-of-living squeezeA candidate from Australia's government claimed victory late on Saturday in a by-election in Victoria state seen as a referendum on Prime Minister Anthony Albanese's handling of cost-of-living pressures across the country. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 23:39:02 GMT SIXQC3FK45P75AZBWFOQUALLHA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/government-candidate-wins-australia-by-election-amid-cost-of-living-squeeze-2024-03-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Moscow says Russia, China agree that Russia must be present in Ukraine talksRussian Deputy Foreign Minister Mikhail Galuzin and China's special representative for Eurasian affairs, Li Hui, said it is impossible to discuss a Ukraine settlement without Moscow's participation, the Russian foreign ministry said on Sunday. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 22:49:57 GMT DMSJEDODCFLJZJJUGZJ5D2NLB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/moscow-says-Russia-china-agree-that-Russia-must-be-present-ukraine-talks-2024-03-02/Reuters世界
Moldova says Russia has no right to lecture on democracyRussia has no right to lecture on democracy, the Moldovan Foreign Ministry said in a statement on Saturday, as tensions between the two countries have risen after Moldova's breakaway Transdniestria region asked Moscow for help. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 22:04:33 GMT A6JTRZYPU5MOJJUD6CF4KNWC5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-says- Russia-has-no-right-lecture-democracy-2024-03-02/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Russia says it destroyed two Ukrainian dronesRussia's defence ministry said its air defences destroyed a Ukrainian unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV), or drone, over Leningrad region, which borders the Gulf of Finland, and a second one in Belgorod region on Saturday. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 19:55:10 GMT Y4U4EMZ36FI7FLR2VPJLPCCAUY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-it-destroyed-two-ukrainian-drones-2024-03-02/Reuters世界欧洲
Israeli military promises thorough investigation into aid convoy deathsThe Israeli military on Saturday promised an exhaustive and truthful investigation into the deaths of Palestinians queuing for aid in Gaza this week, an incident that has drawn condemnations and calls for an international inquiry. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 19:31:16 GMT INLIY4EEU5POVJPNRFPK7VM32Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-military-promises-thorough-investigation-into-aid-convoy-deaths-2024-03-02/Reuters世界中东
Italian naval ship shoots down drone in Red SeaAn Italian navy ship shot down a drone flying towards it in the Red Sea on Saturday, the defence ministry said. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 18:49:33 GMT 2CGZETPCQ5IPVHCFXSMHYV7DSA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/italian-naval-ship-shoots-down-drone-red-sea-2024-03-02/Reuters世界中东
Kamala Harris will talk Gaza ceasefire, aid in DC meeting with Benny GantzGantz, Israel's former military chief and defense minister, is Benjamin Netanyahu's main political rival in opinion polls. His trip to Washington risks upsetting Netanyahu, who has been subject to criticism by President Biden. Sat, 02 Mar 2024 17:44:42 GMT QEMUNSPIA5MSFHQWHJCA2FZMNM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-vp-harris-meet-israeli-war-cabinet-member-monday-official-2024-03-02/Trevor Hunnicutt世界
